item.title: The Lab
item.description: This chapter covers the build, configuration, overview of tools, and walkthroughs of test and real scenarios for the Cybermice Lab. It’s broken into three sections: Setup Talks about design philosophy, covers installation, and provides guides for configuration Tools Provides an overview of the tools used in the scenarios Scenarios Provides scenarios and suggested walkthroughs for training on the tools

item.title: Making Contributions
item.description: Since we are using GitHub for hosting and updating the site, we can leverage the functionality of Git to allow everyone to make contributions to the site. However, a few rules must be followed for this to continue to be viable as a documentation solution. No internal information. This site is very public. Anybody with the url can navigate here. Therefore, documentation here should be restricted to resources and techniques that can be learned from other publicly available resources.
